text: Reipertswiller is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Bas-Rhin department in northeast France. In 2020, Reipertswiller had 846 people. == Geography == Reipertswiller is on the border with the Moselle department. It is part of the Parc naturel r√©gional des Vosges du Nord. It has three villages: Melch, Saegemuhle and Wildenguth. Neighbouring communes are Goetzenbruck to the northwest, Mouterhouse to the north, Baerenthal to the northeast, Wimmenau to the southwest and Lichtenberg to the southeast. == References == Category:Communes in Bas-Rhin
title: Reipertswiller
